title: Nested CV

text:
and independently, nested cross-validation can be done with scikit-learn. nilearn is not going to provide anything that already exists in scikit-learn.
But maybe your question was more specific?

Thank you for your quick responses! 
What I had in my mind was hyperparameter selection and is included in the #698 
Merci!
